comment.author: 69005233@N00
comment._content: A bit more information. She was born in Lansing, Michigan on the 24 August 1878 and was graduated from the University of Michigan (Ann Arbor) approximately 1900. In the 1901 U Michigan directory, she is listed under Faculty/Staff: FLORENCE HEDGES, A.B., Assistant in Botany. 204 North State Street.
